description: Developed an advanced neural network by training it on a diverse set of over 100 client JSON documents. The data was parsed utilizing the Pandas Python library and the machine learning model was developed using TensorFlow alongside AWS Sagemaker, resulting in an prediction accuracy of 98%, significantly reducing the time required for clients to navigate and fill out forms.

Led a project to enhance engineer efficiency and collaboration by creating a Slack bot. This bot streamlined our storage team's workflow by displaying live cluster info and enabling direct cluster reservations through Slack. Additionally, I developed over five Python test automation scripts using the TestRail API to ensure proper functionality of new software releases for the E1000 storage product.

Responsible for developing the complete user interface and portions of the backend-to-frontend logic for a lightweight Electron.js React desktop application. This application processes over 100 GB of flight simulation data, presenting results through interactive 3D models and graphs using Three.js and Plotly.js.
